item.name: Transition Student Department
item.description:
Transition a student from General Education (GE) to a specialized department (CS/IT/IS) when they advance to year 3. This endpoint:
- Validates that the student is eligible for transition (year 2 -> 3)
- Updates the student's department
- Maintains academic integrity by enforcing department-specific course enrollments
- Should be used when students complete their general education requirements

item.name: Create Course Enrollment (Student)
item.description:
Enroll a student in a course with business logic validation:
- Year 1-2 students (GE department) can only enroll in GE courses for their year
- Year 3-4 students can enroll in courses from their specialized department (CS/IT/IS) for their year
- Year 3-4 students can also enroll in GE courses (electives)
- Students cannot enroll in courses outside their department/year restrictions
